Pathology of the RAS is associated with pulmonary hypertension and pulmonary fibrosis.
40 Angiotensin II upregulates the expression of profibrotic cytokines leading to pulmonary fibrosis and severe inflammation with increased vascular permeability. Treatment with ACE inhibitors and ARB may attenuate this.
40 Animal models of ARDS found reduced ACE2 concentrations, and treatment with exogenous ACE2 alleviated the symptoms.
